{ Settlement_ Burnhope and Lanchester
There are two villages in our block:_ Burnhope is a small former pit village surrounded by farming land.It is situated on the top of a hill and is noted for its beautiful and spectacular views. Lanchester is a very large village dating back to the Romans.The site of the Roman fort which accommodated 400 men is now just an uneven field and a few stones.Most of the stones were taken to build All Saints Church and the houses round the village green. Lanchester,a former agricultural centre is now a very popular residential area. { { { Employment There are few opportunites for employment in our block.
